DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of Lyrica in Indian patients with nerve pain
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Pregabalin (Lyrica) for the Treatment of Nerve Pain
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Peripheral neuropathic pain Score of at least 40 mm on the VAS of the SFMPQ at screening and baseline Completion of at least 4 daily pain diary entries with an average daily pain score of at least 4 over the 7 days prior to baseline Exclusion criteria: (none)
